comment: Is this how you treat shareholders, ? I said 's plans to colonize Mars were stupid since there are plenty of problems here on earth he could help solve with his resources, and he got triggered and blocked me!

# ::snt Is this how you treat shareholders, ? I said 's plans to colonize Mars were stupid since there are plenty of problems here on earth he could help solve with his resources, and he got triggered and blocked me!
(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / hold-01
                        :ARG1 (s / share)))
            :ARG2 (t2 / this))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s2 / say-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (s3 / stupid
                        :domain (p2 / plan-01
                              :ARG0 (h2 / he)
                              :ARG1 (c / colonize-01
                                    :ARG0 h2
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / planet
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Mars"))))
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (p4 / problem
                                    :quant (p5 / plenty)
                                    :location (h3 / here
                                          :location p3
                                          :name n
                                          :op1 "Earth")))
                        :ARG1-of (s4 / solve-01
                              :ARG0 h2
                              :ARG2 (r / resource
                                    :poss h2)
                              :ARG1-of (p6 / possible-01)))))
      :op2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (t3 / trigger-01
                  :ARG1 h2)
            :op2 (b / block-01
                  :ARG0 h2
                  :ARG1 ii)))
